[Page Title: Large Parties & Special Events | Little Palm in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Special Events

Large Parties & Special Events

Looking to host a larger gathering? We're ready to accommodate your party and its needs. Whether a corporate dinner, bachelorette party, family gathering, or a more intimate affair, host your special occasion at Little Palm.

For parties of up to 7 guests, please book directly through Resy.
Book your Little Palm reservation on Resy 
Party With Us

For groups of , we offer chef-curated, tropical-inspired family-style menus priced per course. This ensures a relaxed dining experience with a customized menu tailored for your group.
8-20 guests 
Please note that a commitment is required to secure large party reservations.
Plan Your Large Party 
Special Events

For parties of , please contact our sales team and we will be happy to send over menus, pricing, and availability.
21 or more 
Note: Private and semi-private spaces are subject to availability. A contract and deposit may be required for larger events.
Plan Your Special Event

Little Palm in Charleston, SC

A breezy tropical retreat in the heart of Charleston, bringing the vibrant coastal spirit to every moment—from brunch to nightfall. Indulge in our tropically inspired menu, created for sharing, and savor the flavors of the coast across Little Palm’s layered spaces – be it poolside, a vibey restaurant & bar, or lush open-air Backyard. Whether planning a special event or a casual gathering, Little Palm invites you to relax, unwind, and immerse yourself in the warmth of connection. At Little Palm, we craft experiences that go beyond the ordinary. So come for the tropical vibes, stay for the moments that linger.

A coastal experience
